statement:
This theorem, as do Carmo refers it, is one of the most beautiful
theorems in Riemannian geometry:

[**sphere theorem.**]{} [*Let $M$ be a n-dimensional compact simply
connected Riemannian manifold, whose sectional curvature $K$ satisfies
$$0<K_{\rm max}/4<K\le K_{\rm max}$$ Then $M$ is homeomorphic to a
sphere.*]{}

[9]{} M. P. do Carmo, [*Riemannian Geometry*]{}, Birkhäuser, Boston,
1992.
names: sphere theorem from global differential geometry
